SELECT A.CLASSESTREE_CODE AS classestreeCode ,B.CLASSES_CODE AS classesCode ,B.MACHINING_CODE AS machiningCode ,ifNull(B.BREED_CODE,'') AS breedCode ,B.FEATURE_CODE AS featureCode ,A.SCIENTIFIC_NAME AS scientificName ,A.LOCAL_NAME AS localName ,A.SALES_NAME AS salesName ,A.PLACE_ORIGIN AS placeOrigin ,A.PLACE_CURRENT AS placeCurrent ,A.SOURCE AS source ,A.CHILD_TYPE AS childType ,A.FEED_TYPE AS feedType ,A.FEED_PERIOD AS feedPeriod FROM PD_CLASSESTREE_MAT A LEFT JOIN PD_STANDARD B ON A.CLASSESTREE_CODE = B.CLASSESTREE_CODE ORDER BY B.CLASSES_CODE,B.MACHINING_CODE,B.BREED_CODE
LIMIT #{startPos}, #{pageCount}
